text: Adabat (, ), or Haddabat () is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located some east of Çobanbey (al-Rai) and less than from the border with Turkey, it is administratively part of Nahiya al-Rai in al-Bab District. In the 2004 census, Haddabat had a population of 387. ==References== Category:Turkmen communities in Syria
title: Haddabat
